author: Paweł Jarosz
description: Easily and safely manage posting messages in Defold.
name: Pigeon

releases.message:
Added possibility to define multiple possible types for each field in defined message, e.g. `string|number|nil`
Added Lua annotations.
Improved documentation

Added possibility to use another logger - Defold-Log by Insality.
Updated to Defold 1.9.3

## January 2024

* bugfix: `pigeon.send()` now correctly returns `false`, when no subscribers are subscribed to the given message and message is therfore not sent. Thanks to [LaksVister](https://github.com/LaksVister) for finding it out!
Pigeon 1.0 is a fully functional library that I use in my projects, documented and tested.
